trans-unit.source: Provides the means to access and manage an in-process speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i mezzi per accedere e gestire un motore di riconoscimento vocale in-process.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un'istanza di questa classe per uno qualsiasi del riconoscimento vocale installata.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sui tipi di riconoscimento vengono installati, usare il metodo statico <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is for running speech recognition engines in-process, and provides control over various aspects of speech recognition, as follows: - To create an in-process speech recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe è in esecuzione vocale riconoscimento motori in-process e consente di controllare vari aspetti del riconoscimento vocale, come indicato di seguito:: per creare un riconoscimento vocale in-process, utilizzare uno del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>costruttori.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Per gestire le grammatiche riconoscimento vocale, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metodi e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure the input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Per configurare l'input per il riconoscimento, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To perform speech recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Per eseguire il riconoscimento vocale, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To modify how recognition handles silence or unexpected input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Per modificare la modalità di gestione di input imprevisto o inattività riconoscimento, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To change the number of alternates the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Per modificare il numero di alternative restituisce il riconoscimento, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento restituisce i risultati del riconoscimento in un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Per sincronizzare le modifiche al sistema di riconoscimento, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento utilizza più di un thread per eseguire attività.

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Per emulare l'input per il riconoscimento, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognitionEngine object is for the sole use of the process that instantiated the object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto SpeechRecognitionEngine è per l'utilizzo esclusivo del processo di cui creare un'istanza dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> shares a single recognizer with any application that wants to use it.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>condivide un unico riconoscimento con qualsiasi applicazione che necessiti di utilizzarlo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a riconoscimento vocale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse utilizzate non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama l'oggetto di riconoscimento `Finalize` metodo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for the system.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classe utilizzando il riconoscimento vocale predefinito per il sistema.

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin speech recognition, you must load at least one recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di iniziarne il riconoscimento vocale ha il riconoscimento vocale, è necessario caricare almeno una grammatica di riconoscimento e configurare l'input per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per caricare una grammatica, chiamare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Per configurare l'input audio, usare uno dei metodi seguenti:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for a specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classe utilizzando il riconoscimento vocale predefinito per impostazioni locali specificate.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e l'API Speech accettare tutti i codici paese di lingua validi.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `CultureInfo` argument, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire il riconoscimento vocale utilizzando la lingua specificata nel `CultureInfo` argomento, un motore di riconoscimento vocale che supporta che deve essere installato il codice paese di linguaggio.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: I riconoscimento vocale fornita con Microsoft Windows 7 funzionano con i seguenti codici di lingua, paese.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Regno Unito) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Stati Uniti) - de-DE.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Tedesco (Germania) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Spagnolo (Spagna) - fr-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Francese (Francia) - ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Giapponese (Giappone) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Cinese (Cina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Sono inoltre consentiti i codici di lingua cinese (Taiwan) a due lettere, ad esempio "en", "fr" o "es".

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di iniziarne il riconoscimento vocale ha il riconoscimento, è necessario caricare la grammatica di riconoscimento almeno vocale e configurare l'input per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per caricare una grammatica, chiamare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Per configurare l'input audio, usare uno dei metodi seguenti:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale that the speech recognizer must support.
trans-unit.target: Impostazioni locali che deve supportare il riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: None of the installed speech recognizers support the specified locale, or culture is the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: Nessuno del riconoscimento vocale installato supporta le impostazioni locali specificate, o culture dalle impostazioni cultura invarianti.

trans-unit.source: Culture is .
trans-unit.target: Cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> using the information in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> object to specify the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> utilizzando le informazioni contenute in un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"> </xref> per specificare il riconoscimento da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un'istanza di questa classe per uno qualsiasi del riconoscimento vocale installata.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sui tipi di riconoscimento vengono installati, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di iniziarne il riconoscimento vocale ha il riconoscimento, è necessario caricare la grammatica di riconoscimento almeno vocale e configurare l'input per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per caricare una grammatica, chiamare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Per configurare l'input audio, usare uno dei metodi seguenti:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information for the specific speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni per il riconoscimento vocale specifico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class with a string parameter that specifies the name of the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classe con un parametro di stringa che specifica il nome di riconoscimento da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: The token name of the recognizer is the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del token di riconoscimento è il valore della <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>proprietà di riconoscimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get a collection of all the installed recognizers, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere una raccolta di tutti i riconoscitori installati, usare il metodo statico <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Prima di iniziarne il riconoscimento vocale ha il riconoscimento, è necessario caricare la grammatica di riconoscimento almeno vocale e configurare l'input per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per caricare una grammatica, chiamare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Per configurare l'input audio, usare uno dei metodi seguenti:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token name of the speech recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del token del riconoscimento vocale da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: No speech recognizer with that token name is installed, or recognizerId is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Nessun riconoscimento vocale con il nome del token è installato, o recognizerId è una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: recognizerId is .
trans-unit.target: recognizerIdis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il formato dell'audio venga ricevuto dal <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Per configurare l'input audio, usare uno dei metodi seguenti:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of audio at the input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input is not configured or set to the null input.
trans-unit.target: Il formato audio di input per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se l'input non è configurato o è impostato per l'input null.

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il livello dell'audio venga ricevuto dal <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents silence, and 100 represents the maximum input volume.
trans-unit.target: Il valore 0 rappresenta inattività 100 rappresenta il volume di input massimo.

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Il livello audio di input per il riconoscimento vocale, compreso tra 0 e 100.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> indica il livello di input audio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>genera questo evento più volte al secondo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: La frequenza con cui l'evento viene generato varia a seconda del computer in cui è in esecuzione l'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere il livello audio al momento dell'evento, utilizzare la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>proprietà associata <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere il livello corrente audio di input per il riconoscimento, usare il riconoscimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioLevelUpdated delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato AudioLevelUpdated, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione corrente nel flusso audio generato dal dispositivo che fornisce l'input per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioPosition property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà AudioPosition fa riferimento la posizione del dispositivo di input nel proprio flusso audio generato.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>proprietà fa riferimento la posizione del riconoscimento all'interno di input audio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Queste posizioni possono essere diverse.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se ha ricevuto il riconoscimento di input per i quali non ha ancora generato un risultato di riconoscimento, il valore del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>proprietà è minore del valore della proprietà AudioPosition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the audio stream being generated by the input device.
trans-unit.target: Posizione corrente nel flusso audio generato dal dispositivo di input.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> rileva un problema nel segnale audio.

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere si è verificato il problema, utilizzare la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>proprietà associata <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioSignalProblemOccurred delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato AudioSignalProblemOccurred, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato dell'audio venga ricevuto dal <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property represents the audio state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà AudioState rappresenta lo stato audio con un membro con il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>enumerazione.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato dell'input audio per il riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state changes in the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando le modifiche dello stato dell'audio venga ricevuto dal <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere lo stato audio al momento dell'evento, utilizzare la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>proprietà associata <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere lo stato corrente di audio di input per il riconoscimento, usare il riconoscimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato audio, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>enumerazione.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioStateChanged delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato AudioStateChanged, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only background noise, before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'intervallo di tempo durante il quale un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> accetta l'input contiene solo rumore di fondo, prima di finalizzare il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Ogni riconoscimento vocale è disponibile un algoritmo per distinguere tra vocale e di inattività.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer classifies as background noise any non-silence input that does not match the initial rule of any of the recognizer's loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento classifica come qualsiasi inattività-non di input che non corrispondono alla regola iniziale di uno qualsiasi del riconoscimento del rumore caricati e abilitato le grammatiche riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer receives only background noise and silence within the babble timeout interval, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento riceve solo rumore di fondo e inattività entro l'intervallo di timeout babble, il riconoscimento completa l'operazione di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -Per le operazioni di riconoscimento asincrona, genera il riconoscimento di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>evento, in cui il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`e il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -Per operazioni di riconoscimento sincrono e l'emulazione, restituisce il riconoscimento `null`, anziché un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> valido

trans-unit.source: If the babble timeout period is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform a babble timeout check.
trans-unit.target: Se il periodo di timeout babble è impostato su 0, il riconoscimento non in grado di eseguire un controllo di timeout babble.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: L'intervallo di timeout può essere qualsiasi valore non negativo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0 secondi.

trans-unit.source: The duration of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: La durata dell'intervallo di tempo.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è impostata su un valore minore di 0 secondi.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Elimina il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Elimina il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oggetto e rilascia risorse utilizzate durante la sessione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emula input di una frase per il riconoscimento vocale, usando il testo al posto di audio per il riconoscimento vocale sincrono.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di riconoscimento vocale genera il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventi come se l'operazione di riconoscimento non è emulata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento forniti con Vista e Windows 7 Ignora maiuscole / minuscole e caratteri di larghezza quando l'applicazione delle regole di sintassi per la frase di input.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su questo tipo di confronto, vedere l' <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>enumerazione valori <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>e <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento anche Ignora le nuove righe e lo spazio vuoto aggiuntivo e considera la punteggiatura come input letterale.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: L'input per l'operazione di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato dell'operazione di riconoscimento, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se l'operazione non è riuscita o non è abilitato il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento non ha grammatiche di riconoscimento vocale caricate.

trans-unit.source: inputText is .
trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputTextè una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emula input di parole specifiche per il riconoscimento vocale, usando il testo al posto di audio per il riconoscimento vocale sincrono e specifica la modalità di gestione di confronto Unicode tra le parole e le grammatiche di riconoscimento vocale caricato il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di riconoscimento vocale genera il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventi come se l'operazione di riconoscimento non è emulata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento utilizza `compareOptions` quando si applica regole grammaticali per la frase di input.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento forniti con Vista e Windows 7 Ignora maiuscole / minuscole se il <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>o <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>valore è presente.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento Ignora sempre la larghezza del carattere e mai Ignora Katakana / Hiragana.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento inoltre nuove righe e gli spazi vuoti aggiuntivi vengono ignorati e considera i segni di punteggiatura come input letterale.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla larghezza del carattere e il tipo Kana, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>enumerazione.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di unità di word che contiene l'input per l'operazione di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit dei valori di enumerazione che descrivono il tipo di confronto da utilizzare per l'operazione di riconoscimento emulata.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato dell'operazione di riconoscimento, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se l'operazione non è riuscita o non è abilitato il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento non ha grammatiche di riconoscimento vocale caricate.

trans-unit.source: wordUnits is .
trans-unit.target: wordUnitsis .

trans-unit.source: wordUnits contains one or more elements.
trans-unit.target: wordUnitscontiene uno o più elementi.

trans-unit.source: compareOptions contains the , , or flag.
trans-unit.target: compareOptionscontiene il , , o flag.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emula input di una frase per il riconoscimento vocale, usando il testo al posto di audio per il riconoscimento vocale sincrono e specifica la modalità di gestione di confronto Unicode tra la frase e le grammatiche di riconoscimento vocale caricato il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di riconoscimento vocale genera il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventi come se l'operazione di riconoscimento non è emulata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento utilizza `compareOptions` quando si applica regole grammaticali per la frase di input.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento forniti con Vista e Windows 7 Ignora maiuscole / minuscole se il <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>o <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>valore è presente.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento Ignora sempre la larghezza del carattere e mai Ignora Katakana / Hiragana.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento inoltre nuove righe e gli spazi vuoti aggiuntivi vengono ignorati e considera i segni di punteggiatura come input letterale.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla larghezza del carattere e il tipo Kana, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>enumerazione.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato dell'operazione di riconoscimento, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se l'operazione non è riuscita o non è abilitato il riconoscimento.
