trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il riconoscimento completa un'operazione di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>al termine dell'operazione.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare il risultato di un'operazione asincrona di riconoscimento, collegare un gestore eventi per il riconoscimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento ha generato l'evento ogni volta che completata correttamente un'operazione di riconoscimento sincrono o asincrono.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento non è stato completato la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>oggetto, che è possibile accedere nel gestore per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>evento, saranno `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire il riconoscimento sincrono, utilizzare uno del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performs one or more asynchronous speech recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Esegue una o più operazioni di riconoscimento vocale asincrona.

trans-unit.source: If `mode` is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, the recognizer continues performing asynchronous recognition operations until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se `mode` è <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, il riconoscimento continua l'esecuzione di operazioni asincrone riconoscimento fino a quando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Durante una chiamata a questo metodo, il riconoscimento può generare gli eventi seguenti:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il riconoscimento rileva l'input che è possibile identificare come riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando l'input viene creata una corrispondenza ambigua con una delle grammatiche attive.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il riconoscimento completa un'operazione di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>al termine dell'operazione.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare il risultato di un'operazione asincrona di riconoscimento, collegare un gestore eventi per il riconoscimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento ha generato l'evento ogni volta che completata correttamente un'operazione di riconoscimento sincrono o asincrono.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento non è stato completato la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>oggetto, che è possibile accedere nel gestore per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>evento, saranno `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Un'operazione asincrona di riconoscimento può non riuscire per i motivi seguenti:-riconoscimento vocale non viene rilevato prima della scadono gli intervalli di timeout per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: -Il motore di riconoscimento vocale rileva, ma non trova corrispondenze in uno dei relativi caricati e abilitati <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire il riconoscimento sincrono, utilizzare uno del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to perform one or multiple recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Indica se eseguire una o più operazioni di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: Terminates asynchronous recognition without waiting for the current recognition operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Termina il riconoscimento asincrono senza attendere il completamento dell'operazione di riconoscimento corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method immediately finalizes asynchronous recognition.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo completa immediatamente riconoscimento asincrono.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the input is truncated and the operation completes with the existing input.
trans-unit.target: Se l'operazione di riconoscimento asincrona corrente riceve input, l'input viene troncato e il completamento dell'operazione con l'input esistente.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is canceled, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Genera il riconoscimento di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>evento quando viene annullata un'operazione asincrona e imposta il <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>a `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method cancels asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo annulla le operazioni asincrone avviate dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To stop asynchronous recognition without truncating the input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per arrestare il riconoscimento asincrono senza troncamento di input, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stops asynchronous recognition after the current recognition operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Arresta il riconoscimento asincrono al termine dell'operazione di riconoscimento corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method finalizes asynchronous recognition without truncating input.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo completa il riconoscimento asincrono senza troncamento di input.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the recognizer continues accepting input until the current recognition operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Se l'operazione di riconoscimento asincrona corrente riceve input, il riconoscimento continua accettare input fino al completamento dell'operazione di riconoscimento corrente.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is stopped, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Genera il riconoscimento di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>evento quando un'operazione asincrona viene arrestata e imposta il <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>a `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method stops asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo arresta le operazioni asincrone avviate dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To immediately cancel asynchronous recognition with only the existing input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per annullare immediatamente riconoscimento asincrono con solo l'input esistente, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> completa un'operazione asincrona di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metodo inizia un'operazione asincrona di riconoscimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer finalizes the asynchronous operation, it raises this event.
trans-unit.target: Quando il riconoscimento completa l'operazione asincrona, genera questo evento.

trans-unit.source: Using the handler for the RecognizeCompleted event, you can access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza il gestore per l'evento RecognizeCompleted, è possibile accedere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>nel <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento non è riuscito, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>sarà `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a timeout or an interruption in audio input caused recognition to fail, you can access the properties for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare se un timeout o un'interruzione nel input audio ha causato il riconoscimento esito negativo, è possibile accedere alle proprietà per <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> class for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>Per ulteriori informazioni.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To obtain details on the best rejected recognition candidates, attach a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni dettagliate sui migliori candidati riconoscimento rifiutati, collegare un gestore per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato RecognizeCompleted, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione corrente del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> nell'input audio in elaborazione.

trans-unit.source: The audio position is specific to each speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: La posizione audio è specifica per ogni riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: The zero value of an input stream is established when it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Il valore zero di un flusso di input viene stabilito quando è abilitato.

trans-unit.source: The RecognizerAudioPosition property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà RecognizerAudioPosition fa riferimento il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>posizione dell'oggetto all'interno di input audio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>proprietà fa riferimento la posizione del dispositivo di input nel proprio flusso audio generato.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Queste posizioni possono essere diverse.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the RecognizerAudioPosition property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se ha ricevuto il riconoscimento di input per i quali non ha ancora generato un risultato di riconoscimento, il valore della proprietà RecognizerAudioPosition è minore del valore del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: La posizione del riconoscimento l'elaborazione dell'input audio.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le informazioni relative all'istanza corrente di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get information about all of the installed speech recognizers for the current system, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni su tutti i tipi di riconoscimento vocale installata per il sistema corrente, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information about the current speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sul riconoscimento vocale corrente.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a running <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> pauses to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando in esecuzione <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> pause per accettare le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> before modifying its settings or its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Le applicazioni devono utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>sospendere un'istanza in esecuzione di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>prima di modificare le impostazioni o dai relativi <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>genera questo evento quando è pronto per accettare le modifiche.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, mentre il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>è sospesa, è possibile caricare, scaricare, abilitare e disabilitare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti e modificare i valori per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizerUpdateReached delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato RecognizerUpdateReached, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state.
trans-unit.target: Richieste che consente di sospendere il riconoscimento per aggiornare il relativo stato.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato il riconoscimento di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>evento, il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>è `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per fornire un token dell'utente, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un offset di posizione audio, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Richiede che il riconoscimento viene sospeso per aggiornare lo stato e fornisce un token utente per l'evento associato.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato il riconoscimento di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>evento, il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>contiene il valore del `userToken` parametro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un offset di posizione audio, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni definite dall'utente che contiene informazioni per l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Richiede che il riconoscimento viene sospeso per aggiornare lo stato e fornisce un offset e un token utente per l'evento associato.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento non avvierà la richiesta di aggiornamento per il riconoscimento fino a quando il riconoscimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>corrente è uguale a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>più `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato il riconoscimento di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>evento, il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>contiene il valore del `userToken` parametro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni definite dall'utente che contiene informazioni per l'operazione.

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: L'offset dall'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>ritardare la richiesta.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oggetto per ricevere input da un flusso audio.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento raggiunge la fine del flusso di input durante un'operazione di riconoscimento, l'operazione di riconoscimento completa con l'input disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Operazioni successive riconoscimento è possono generare un'eccezione, a meno che non si aggiorna l'input per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The audio input stream.
trans-unit.target: Il flusso di input audio.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: Il formato dell'input audio.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Configura il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oggetto per ricevere input dal dispositivo audio predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Disables the input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Disabilita l'input per il riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: Configure the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object for no input when using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods, or when taking a recognition engine temporarily off line.
trans-unit.target: Configurare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>oggetto per nessun input quando si utilizza il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metodi, o quando si acquisisce un motore di riconoscimento temporaneamente non in linea.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a Waveform audio format (.wav) file.
trans-unit.target: Configura il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oggetto per ricevere input da un file di formato audio (wav) della forma d'onda.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input file during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento raggiunge la fine del file di input durante un'operazione di riconoscimento, l'operazione di riconoscimento completa con l'input disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Operazioni successive riconoscimento è possono generare un'eccezione, a meno che non si aggiorna l'input per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The path of the file to use as input.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso del file da utilizzare come input.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a stream that contains Waveform audio format (.wav) data.
trans-unit.target: Configura il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> oggetto per ricevere input da un flusso che contiene i dati in formato audio (wav) della forma d'onda.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento raggiunge la fine del flusso di input durante un'operazione di riconoscimento, l'operazione di riconoscimento completa con l'input disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Operazioni successive riconoscimento è possono generare un'eccezione, a meno che non si aggiorna l'input per il riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: The stream containing the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Flusso contenente i dati audio.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> rileva l'input che è possibile identificare come riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Ogni riconoscimento vocale è disponibile un algoritmo per distinguere tra vocale e di inattività.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> performs a speech recognition operation, it raises the SpeechDetected event when its algorithm identifies the input as speech.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>esegue un'operazione di riconoscimento vocale, viene generato l'evento SpeechDetected quando l'algoritmo identifica l'input come riconoscimento vocale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>oggetto indica una posizione nel flusso di input in cui il riconoscimento per rilevata il riconoscimento vocale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the SpeechDetected event before it raises any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> events.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>Genera l'evento SpeechDetected prima che venga generato uno qualsiasi del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>eventi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechDetected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato SpeechDetected, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> ha riconosciuto una o più parole che possono essere un componente di più intere frasi in una grammatica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> generates numerous SpeechHypothesized events as it attempts to identify an input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>Genera l'errore numerosi eventi SpeechHypothesized tenta di identificare una frase di input.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can access the text of partially recognized phrases in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the SpeechHypothesized event.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere al testo di frasi parzialmente riconosciute il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>oggetto nel gestore per l'evento SpeechHypothesized.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, handling these events is useful only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: In genere, la gestione di questi eventi è utile solo per il debug.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>deriva da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>proprietà e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechHypothesized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato SpeechHypothesized, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that does not match any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> riceve l'input che non corrisponde ad alcuno dei caricati e abilitati <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: L'evento viene generato il riconoscimento, se rileva che input non corrisponde con sufficiente sicurezza tutti i relativi caricati e abilitati <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>contiene il rifiutati <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the handler for the SpeechRecognitionRejected event to retrieve recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> that were rejected and their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> scores.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il gestore per l'evento SpeechRecognitionRejected per recuperare il riconoscimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>che sono stati rifiutati e il loro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>punteggi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione utilizza un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>istanza, è possibile modificare il livello di confidenza quali sintesi e riconoscimento vocale è è accettato o rifiutato con uno degli input di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare una modalità di risposta il riconoscimento vocale non vocale input mediante la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognitionRejected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato SpeechRecognitionRejected, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that matches any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione generata quando il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> riceve l'input che corrisponde a uno dei relativi caricati e abilitati <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate a recognition operation using the one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: È possibile avviare un'operazione di riconoscimento utilizzando uno del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the SpeechRecognized event if it determines that input matches one of its loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects with a sufficient level of confidence to constitute recognition.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento genera l'evento di SpeechRecognized se determina che input corrisponde a uno dei relativi caricato <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti con un livello di confidenza al riconoscimento sufficiente.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>contiene accettata <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handlers of SpeechRecognized events can obtain the recognized phrase as well as a list of recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> with lower confidence scores.
trans-unit.target: I gestori di eventi SpeechRecognized ottenerla alla frase riconosciuta, nonché un elenco di riconoscimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>con punteggi di confidenza inferiore.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione utilizza un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>istanza, è possibile modificare il livello di confidenza quali sintesi e riconoscimento vocale è è accettato o rifiutato con uno degli input di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare una modalità di risposta il riconoscimento vocale non vocale input mediante la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando il riconoscimento riceve l'input che corrisponde a una grammatica, il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>può generare l'oggetto relativo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>evento viene generato prima dell'evento SpeechRecognized del riconoscimento vocale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Any tasks specific to a particular grammar should always be performed by a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi attività specifiche di una particolare grammatica dovrebbe sempre essere eseguita da un gestore per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato SpeechRecognized, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [eventi e delegati](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Unloads all <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects from the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Scarica tutti <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> oggetti di sistema di riconoscimento.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> asynchronously, this method waits until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> is loaded, before it unloads all of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento sta attualmente caricando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>in modo asincrono, questo metodo attende fino a quando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>viene caricato, prima che venga scaricato tutti il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>istanza.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per scaricare una grammatica specifica, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Scarica un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Se il riconoscimento è in esecuzione, le applicazioni devono utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>per sospendere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>istanza prima del caricamento, scaricamento, abilitazione o disabilitazione di un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per scaricare tutti <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The grammar object to unload.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto grammatica da scaricare.

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: The grammar is not loaded in this recognizer, or this recognizer is currently loading the grammar asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: La grammatica non caricata in questo riconoscimento o il riconoscimento sta caricando la grammatica in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified setting for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> with the specified integer value.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna l'impostazione specificata per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> con il valore intero specificato.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: Ad eccezione di `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, i valori delle proprietà impostati mediante il metodo UpdateRecognizerSetting rimangono valide solo per l'istanza corrente di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, dopo cui ripristinare le impostazioni predefinite.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: Vedere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>per le descrizioni delle impostazioni supportate.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to update.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'impostazione per l'aggiornamento.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per l'impostazione.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameè una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento non dispone di un'impostazione con lo stesso nome.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified speech recognition engine setting with the specified string value.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna l'impostazione di motore di riconoscimento vocale specificato con il valore di stringa specificata.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: Ad eccezione di `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, i valori delle proprietà impostati mediante il metodo UpdateRecognizerSetting rimangono valide solo per l'istanza corrente di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, dopo cui ripristinare le impostazioni predefinite.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: Vedere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>per le descrizioni delle impostazioni supportate.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to update.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'impostazione per l'aggiornamento.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore per l'impostazione.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameè una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: Il riconoscimento non dispone di un'impostazione con lo stesso nome.
